Key Match Events: Luke Thomas hit a grand slam off Tarik Skubal in the 5th inning, leading the Guardians to a 7-3 win
Post-Match Reflections: The Guardians celebrated their victory with champagne and beer bottles, marking their third ALCS victory in a month
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers scored 3 runs in the 9th inning but fell short
The series win advanced the Guardians to the ALCS
Others: The game was played at Progressive Field with an attendance of 34,105
